decks.notes: The key concept of this Modern deck is to aggressively use the Death's Shadow card as a powerful threat. The deck aims to reduce its own life total quickly to make Death's Shadow larger and more difficult to deal with. It also includes a mix of efficient creatures and spells, such as Tarmogoyf, Wild Nacatl, and Temur Battle Rage, to apply early pressure and close out the game quickly. The deck also utilizes disruption and card draw with Thoughtseize and Mishra's Bauble to maintain control of the game.

This deck focuses on rapidly filling the graveyard with cards like Faithless Looting, Goblin Lore, and Burning Inquiry to fuel powerful creatures like Hollow One, Flamewake Phoenix, and Gurmag Angler. The aggressive playstyle aims to quickly swarm the board with creatures and deal damage to the opponent as quickly as possible. The deck also includes discard and removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Fatal Push to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with fast, efficient threats while maintaining card advantage through graveyard interactions.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the Dredge mechanic to quickly fill up the graveyard with key cards such as Life from the Loam, Creeping Chill, and Prized Amalgam. By continuously dredging cards from the graveyard, the deck aims to quickly bring back creatures like Bloodghast and Narcomoeba to the battlefield while also dealing damage with Creeping Chill. The deck utilizes cards like Shriekhorn and Faithless Looting to help dig for key pieces and set up explosive turns to overwhelm the opponent with a combo finish.

This deck focuses on utilizing cards that allow you to quickly fill your graveyard with cards such as Faithless Looting and Cathartic Reunion, to then bring back powerful creatures like Prized Amalgam and Bloodghast using Life from the Loam. The goal is to create a powerful board presence through dredging and milling cards, while also gaining incremental value from cards like Creeping Chill. By combining these effects, the deck is able to overwhelm opponents with its powerful graveyard synergies and create a fast and aggressive win condition.

The main concept of this Dredge deck is to quickly fill your graveyard with cards like Faithless Looting and Cathartic Reunion, allowing you to consistently bring back creatures like Bloodghast and Prized Amalgam. By utilizing cards like Life from the Loam to bring lands back from the graveyard, you can also trigger effects like Creeping Chill to deal damage to your opponent while gaining life. Conflagrate can be used as a finisher to deal a large amount of damage to your opponent. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and consistent graveyard-based strategy.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the Dredge mechanic to fill up the graveyard with cards like Bloodghast, Narcomoeba, and Prized Amalgam, then bring them back onto the battlefield without needing to cast them. This synergy is supported by cards like Faithless Looting, Life from the Loam, and Cathartic Reunion to quickly dredge through the deck. Creeping Chill and Conflagrate can be used to finish off the opponent once the graveyard is set up. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and consistent graveyard recursion strategy.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by utilizing powerful red creatures and spells to disrupt your opponent's game plan. By playing cards like Chandra, Torch of Defiance, Goblin Rabblemaster, and Ensnaring Bridge, you can keep your opponent's threats at bay while applying pressure with your own creatures. Additionally, cards like Chalice of the Void and Blood Moon can further disrupt your opponent's strategy, allowing you to dictate the pace of the game. Overall, this deck aims to establish dominance and control the board to secure a victory.

The deck focuses on using artifacts such as Welding Jar, Engineered Explosives, and Chalice of the Void to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategies. It also utilizes cards like Ensnaring Bridge and Torpor Orb to protect itself and hinder the opponent's creatures. The deck aims to assemble key pieces like Whir of Invention and Ancient Stirrings to tutor for specific artifacts and win conditions. The mana base includes lands like Spire of Industry and Inventors' Fair to support the artifact-centric strategy. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent through strategic control and resource management.

The main idea of this deck is to deal damage quickly and efficiently, using a combination of low-cost, high-impact burn spells and aggressive creatures. By playing cards like Lightning Bolt, Lava Spike, and Boros Charm, along with creatures like Goblin Guide and Monastery Swiftspear, the deck aims to put constant pressure on the opponent and end the game as quickly as possible. Eidolon of the Great Revel and Searing Blaze help disrupt the opponent's game plan while also dealing damage, creating a powerful aggro strategy that can overwhelm opponents in the Modern format.

The main concept of this Golgari Aggro deck is to maintain board control and pressure the opponent by quickly deploying efficient threats and disrupting their game plan with removal spells and discard effects. With a focus on high-value creatures like Tarmogoyf and Dark Confidant, along with powerful planeswalkers like Liliana of the Veil, the deck aims to apply pressure from multiple angles while disrupting the opponent's resources. The mana base is optimized for consistency and flexibility, allowing the deck to adapt to various matchups and navigate the complex Modern metagame effectively.

The deck focuses on applying early pressure with efficient creatures like Tarmogoyf and Dark Confidant, backed up by disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck also has a strong mid-to-late game presence with cards like Liliana of the Veil and Tireless Tracker to grind out incremental advantages. The mana base is designed to support the deck's aggressive game plan while also providing options for disruption with cards like Field of Ruin. Overall, the deck aims to aggressively disrupt the opponent while applying pressure on multiple fronts to secure a victory.

The primary focus of this deck is to constantly pressure the opponent with low-cost spells that can deal damage quickly, while utilizing cards that allow for recurring threats like Arclight Phoenix. The deck aims to maintain a fast pace and overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize, with a mix of burn spells and aggressive creatures to chip away at the opponent's life total. The deck also includes card draw and looting effects to help find key pieces and ensure a consistent stream of threats.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly lower your own life total to increase the power of Death's Shadow and Gurmag Angler. By utilizing cards like Mishra's Bauble, Street Wraith, and Thought Scour to draw and discard cards rapidly, along with Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek to disrupt your opponent's game plan, this deck aims to apply early pressure and close out the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. Stubborn Denial provides additional protection for your threats, while removal spells like Fatal Push and Dismember help clear the way for your creatures to attack.

The focus of this deck is to play aggressively with low-cost spells and creatures to do consistent damage quickly. By using cards like Lightning Bolt, Lava Spike, and Monastery Swiftspear, the deck aims to pressure the opponent and efficiently burn through their life total. Additional cards like Arclight Phoenix and Bedlam Reveler provide powerful finishers to close out games. The deck also incorporates card advantage through Faithless Looting and Light Up the Stage to keep a continuous stream of threats on the battlefield.

The deck focuses on building up a powerful board presence quickly through deploying artifact creatures with +1/+1 counters and utilizing synergies with Hardened Scales to boost their effectiveness. By combining efficient creatures like Walking Ballista and Steel Overseer with support cards like Animation Module and Evolutionary Leap, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of growing threats. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Ancient Stirrings and Mishra's Bauble helps to ensure consistency and card advantage throughout the game.

The deck focuses on playing low-cost artifact creatures that benefit from +1/+1 counters, such as Hangarback Walker and Arcbound Ravager, in combination with Hardened Scales to maximize their growth. Using cards like Animation Module and Steel Overseer to further enhance the synergies, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with an aggressive board presence. With the ability to generate mana through cards like Mox Opal and the potential for explosive plays, this deck is designed to put pressure on the opponent and close out games quickly.
